sentences.en: Andy : That's a swimsuit? Looks more like a top and skirt.
sentences.cn: 那是泳装 吗 ?看起来像是ㄧ件上衣加ㄧ条裙子丫!

sentences.en: Entrants competed in three categories - swimsuit, evening gown and interview.
sentences.cn: 选手们有三项比赛项目:泳装 、 礼服以及最后的访谈.

sentences.en: Fashion and excitement come naturally with this 1 - piece swimsuit with piping.
sentences.cn: 时装和兴奋自然是与此1件泳衣与管道.

sentences.en: He wore his swimsuit underneath his slacks.
sentences.cn: 他在运动服里面衬着游泳衣.

sentences.en: Her yellow swimsuIt'serves as a perfect foil to her bronzed skin.
sentences.cn: 黄色的泳衣与她铜色的肌肤是完美的陪衬.

sentences.en: I wanted to get a new swimsuit, but the store didn't have any in yet.
sentences.cn: 我想买件新游泳衣, 可商店还没进货.

sentences.en: I'm going to wear my new swimsuit the pink stripes.
sentences.cn: 我要穿那件粉色条纹的泳衣.

sentences.en: Jane: I see that. You're already wearing your swimsuit.
sentences.cn: 珍: 我看到了, 你已经穿著你的泳衣了.

sentences.en: Lisa is trying to shape up for the swimsuIt'season.
sentences.cn: 莉莎正在努力为穿泳装的季节而锻练体形.

sentences.en: Now you know why I'm wearing my swimsuit, says Danny.
sentences.cn: “现在你们知道我为什么穿泳衣了, ”丹尼说.

sentences.en: Remember to wring your swimsuit out after you swim.
sentences.cn: 记住游泳过后要把游泳衣拧干.

sentences.en: Remember to wring your swimsuit out after your swim.
sentences.cn: 游完泳后记住把游泳衣拧干.

sentences.en: The right style of swimsuit can help by hiding bulges.
sentences.cn: 款式适当的游泳衣有助于掩饰肥胖部位.

sentences.en: The right style of swimsuit can help to hide, minimise or emphasise what you want it to.
sentences.cn: 款式选择得当的泳装有助于按照意愿掩饰、缩小或突出某些部位。

sentences.en: The swimsuit comes in navy with white spots or blue with green spots.
sentences.cn: 这款泳衣有藏青色带白色圆点的，也有蓝色带绿色圆点的。

words.tran_cn: 游泳的；游泳用的；善于游泳的；晕眩的

trans.tran_en: a piece of clothing worn for swimming
